title: Union boss McCluskey took private jet flights arranged by building firm, report finds
content: The ex-Unite chief enjoyed flights arranged by the firm building a controversial hotel, report seen by BBC says.

title: Man who murdered wife as she pushed their baby in pram jailed for life
content: Kulsuma Akter had been living in a refuge in Bradford when she was fatally stabbed by Habibur Masum.

title: Cleverly returns to Tory front bench as Badenoch reshuffles team
content: The former foreign secretary will become shadow housing secretary, the BBC understands.

title: Food bills on course to rise by £275 a year as prices jump
content: Households are trading down or making simpler meals to save money on groceries, research shows.

title: Elvis experience costing up to £300 branded 'atrocious and misleading'
content: Some ticketholders are demanding a refund as they say they were promised a hologram version of Elvis.
